statements: UPDATE public_transportation_maintenance_records SET cost = 2500, maintenance_type = 'Scheduled Maintenance' WHERE record_id = 100
UPDATE public_transportation_maintenance_records SET vehicle_id = 101, date_performed = '2023-05-15' WHERE record_id = 200
UPDATE public_transportation_maintenance_records SET date_performed = '2022-05-15', cost = 350.75 WHERE record_id = 101 AND vehicle_id = 201 AND maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
UPDATE public_transportation_maintenance_records SET cost = 500.25, maintenance_type = 'Inspection' WHERE vehicle_id = 203 AND record_id = 102 AND date_performed = '2022-06-20';
UPDATE maintenance_records SET mechanic_name='John Doe', maintenance_type='Oil Change' WHERE record_id=1;
UPDATE vehicle_details SET year=2019, emission_level='Low Emission' WHERE vehicle_id=2;
UPDATE maintenance_records SET maintenance_type='Oil Change', mechanic_name='John Doe' WHERE record_id=101;
UPDATE vehicle_details SET emission_level='Low Emission', year=2019 WHERE manufacturer='Toyota';
UPDATE maintenance_records SET maintenance_type = 'Oil Change', maintenance_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE record_id = 101
UPDATE vehicles SET manufacturer = 'Toyota', year = 2019, license_plate = 'ABC123' WHERE vehicle_id = 201
UPDATE maintenance_records SET maintenance_date = '2021-07-15', maintenance_description = 'Replaced spark plugs' WHERE record_id = 101
UPDATE environmental_impact SET emissions_rating = 3, eco_friendly = false WHERE vehicle_id = 201
UPDATE MaintenanceRecords SET maintenance_notes = 'Changed oil filter' WHERE record_id = 101
UPDATE Vehicles SET year = 2019, capacity = 5 WHERE vehicle_id = 201
UPDATE MaintenanceRecords SET maintenance_type = 'Repair', maintenance_notes = 'Engine replacement' WHERE record_id = 1;
UPDATE Vehicles SET capacity = 5, manufacturer = 'Toyota' WHERE vehicle_id = 2;
UPDATE MaintenanceRecords SET maintenance_cost = 250.00, maintenance_details = 'Replaced spark plugs' WHERE record_id = 12345;
UPDATE Vehicles SET purchase_date = '2022-09-15', manufacturer = 'Toyota' WHERE vehicle_id = 98765;
UPDATE MaintenanceRecords SET maintenance_cost = 1500.50, maintenance_details = 'Engine overhaul' WHERE record_id = 101;
UPDATE FuelConsumption SET fuel_liters = 50.75, fuel_cost = 70.25, fuel_date = '2022-07-15' WHERE vehicle_id = 201;
